PipeOpNlOptModelAvg

Source: R/PipeOpEnsemble.R

Aggregates over different PredictionRegrs. Weights for each learner are learned using (nloptr)nloptr::nloptr. For help with nloptr see nloptr::nloptr.print.options(). Returns a single PredictionRegr. By default, optimizes MeasureRegrMSE and only allows weights between 0 and 1. Used for regression Predictions.

Aggregates over different PredictionClassifs. Either computes the mode, if predict_type is "response", or averages probabilities if predict_type is "prob". Weights for each learner are learned using (nloptr)nloptr::nloptr. For help with nloptr see nloptr::nloptr.print.options(). Returns a single PredictionClassif. As a default, optimizes MeasureClassifMMCE and only allows weights between 0 and 1. Used for classification Predictions.

PipeOpNlOptModelAvg

PipeOpNlOptMajorityVote

Format

R6Class PipeOpNlOptModelAvg

Examples

op = PipeOpNlOptModelAvg$new(3)
op = PipeOpNlOptMajorityVote$new(3)
